component.name: lpddr5_clk0_1
component.description: Shared system clock for Lpddr5 controller0 (Bank 700 and 701) and controller1 (Bank 703 and 704)

component.name: lpddr5_clk3_4
component.description: Shared system clock for Lpddr5 Controller3 (Bank 710 and 711) and controller4 (Bank 714 and 715)

component.name: lpddr5_clk2
component.description: Dedicated system clock for Lpddr5 Controller2 (Bank 708 and 709)

component.name: lpddr5_Controller_c0
component.description: 512Mb x 32 (512Mbx16 x1Die x2 CH x 1R) lpddr5 memory

component.description: 512Mb x 32 (512Mbx16 x1Die x2 CH x 1R) lpddr5 memory

component.name: pl_uart_bank705
